◆ get_raw_device()

IDeckLinkInput * DeckLink::DeviceInputInterface::get_raw_device ( )

Get a raw pointer to the underlying device.

This allows you to call additional methods that may not be wrapped by the DeviceInputInterface class.

Returns
A pointer to the device
